==Acheiropoieta and reported visions==
==Acheiropoieta and reported visions==
{{also|Acheiropoieta}}

[[File:Divine Mercy (Adolf Hyla painting)2007-08-16.jpg|thumb|150px|The ''[[Divine Mercy image|Divine Mercy painting]]'' by [[Adolf Hyla]], 1943.]]
 
During the Middle Ages a number of legendary images of Jesus began to appear, at times perhaps constructed to validate the styles of depiction of that period, e.g. the [[image of Edessa]].<ref name=JensenBWell /> The [[Veil of Veronica]] was accompanied by a narrative about the Passion of Jesus.<ref name=JensenBWell />
During the Middle Ages a number of legendary images of Jesus began to appear, at times perhaps constructed to validate the styles of depiction of that period, e.g. the [[image of Edessa]].<ref name=JensenBWell /> The [[Veil of Veronica]] was accompanied by a narrative about the Passion of Jesus.<ref name=JensenBWell />
